files.content:
For all designs I ask you to make, have them be beautiful, not cookie cutter. Make webpages that are fully featured and worthy for production.

By default, this template supports JSX syntax with Tailwind CSS classes, React hooks, and Lucide React for icons. Do not install other packages for UI themes, icons, etc unless absolutely necessary or I request them.

Use icons from lucide-react for logos.

Use stock photos from unsplash where appropriate, only valid URLs you know exist. Do not download the images, only link to them in image tags.

# Logs
logs
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*
pnpm-debug.log*
lerna-debug.log*

node_modules
dist
dist-ssr
*.local

# Editor directories and files
.vscode/*
!.vscode/extensions.json
.idea
.DS_Store
*.suo
*.ntvs*
*.njsproj
*.sln
*.sw?

{
  "name": "vee4me-ai-consulting",
  "private": true,
  "version": "0.0.0",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "dev": "vite",
    "build": "vite build",
    "lint": "eslint .",
    "preview": "vite preview",
    "backup": "node scripts/backup.js",
    "restore": "node scripts/restore.js"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "framer-motion": "^11.0.8",
    "lucide-react": "^0.344.0",
    "react": "^18.3.1",
    "react-dom": "^18.3.1",
    "react-intersection-observer": "^9.8.1",
    "react-router-dom": "^6.22.3"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "@eslint/js": "^9.9.1",
    "@types/react": "^18.3.5",
    "@types/react-dom": "^18.3.0",
    "@vitejs/plugin-react": "^4.3.1",
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.18",
    "eslint": "^9.9.1",
    "eslint-plugin-react-hooks": "^5.1.0-rc.0",
    "eslint-plugin-react-refresh": "^0.4.11",
    "globals": "^15.9.0",
    "postcss": "^8.4.35",
    "sharp": "^0.33.2",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.4.1",
    "typescript": "^5.5.3",
    "typescript-eslint": "^8.3.0",
    "vite": "^5.4.2",
    "vite-plugin-image-optimizer": "^1.1.7"
  }
}

import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { useInView } from 'react-intersection-observer'; import { Search, Globe, BarChart2, TrendingUp, Link2, FileSearch, Smartphone, Share2, Zap, Target, LineChart, ArrowUpRight, Hash, FileText, Code, ExternalLink, CheckCircle, Network, BarChart, Award, Sparkles, ChevronRight, PieChart, Layers, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react'; import { BackgroundParticles } from './BackgroundParticles'; import { SectionHeader } from './ui/SectionHeader'; const metrics = [ { label: 'Organic Traffic Increase', value: '280%', icon: TrendingUp }, { label: 'Keyword Rankings', value: '500+', icon: Target }, { label: 'Domain Authority', value: '65+', icon: Globe }, { label: 'Conversion Rate', value: '12%', icon: LineChart }, ]; const keywordGroups = [ { title: 'Primary Keywords', description: 'High-value terms driving core business objectives', keywords: [ { term: 'AI Consulting Services', volume: '12K', difficulty: 'High', priority: 1 }, { term: 'Enterprise AI Solutions', volume: '8K', difficulty: 'Medium', priority: 1 }, { term: 'AI Implementation', volume: '15K', difficulty: 'High', priority: 1 }, { term: 'Business AI Integration', volume: '10K', difficulty: 'Medium', priority: 2 } ], gradient: 'from-purple-500 to-pink-500', importance: 'These keywords directly target decision-makers and drive high-value conversions.' }, { title: 'Secondary Keywords', description: 'Supporting terms enhancing topical relevance', keywords: [ { term: 'AI Workflow Automation', volume: '5K', difficulty: 'Medium', priority: 2 }, { term: 'Custom AI Models', volume: '3K', difficulty: 'Low', priority: 3 }, { term: 'AI Business Strategy', volume: '7K', difficulty: 'Medium', priority: 2 }, { term: 'AI ROI Calculator', volume: '2K', difficulty: 'Low', priority: 3 } ], gradient: 'from-blue-500 to-cyan-500', importance: 'These keywords support our content strategy and capture users earlier in their journey.' } ]; const seoStructure = [ { title: 'Semantic HTML', description: 'Properly structured content hierarchy', examples: [ 'Article Schema Implementation', 'Service Page Organization', 'FAQ Schema Integration', 'Breadcrumb Navigation' ], benefits: [ 'Improved Search Engine Understanding', 'Better Content Accessibility', 'Enhanced User Experience', 'Clear Content Hierarchy' ], icon: Code, gradient: 'from-orange-500 to-red-500' }, { title: 'Schema Markup', description: 'Rich snippets for enhanced SERP visibility', examples: [ 'Organization Schema', 'Service Schema', 'Review Schema', 'FAQ Schema' ], benefits: [ 'Rich Snippet Display', 'Increased Click-Through Rates', 'Better Search Visibility', 'Enhanced Knowledge Graph' ], icon: FileText, gradient: 'from-green-500 to-emerald-500' }, { title: 'URL Structure', description: 'Clean, descriptive URLs for better crawling', examples: [ '/services/ai-consulting', '/case-studies/enterprise-ai', '/resources/ai-implementation', '/blog/ai-trends' ], benefits: [ 'Improved Crawlability', 'User-Friendly Navigation', 'Clear Site Structure', 'Better Link Sharing' ], icon: Link2, gradient: 'from-violet-500 to-fuchsia-500' } ]; const internalLinking = { title: 'Strategic Internal Linking', description: 'Optimized content connections for enhanced user experience and SEO value', benefits: [ 'Improved Site Navigation', 'Enhanced Crawlability', 'Better Link Equity Distribution', 'Increased Page Authority' ], examples: [ { from: 'Service Pages', to: 'Case Studies', benefit: 'Demonstrates real-world applications', impact: 'High' }, { from: 'Blog Posts', to: 'Service Pages', benefit: 'Drives conversions from content', impact: 'Medium' }, { from: 'Resources', to: 'Product Pages', benefit: 'Enhances educational value', impact: 'High' } ], bestPractices: [ 'Use descriptive anchor text', 'Link to relevant, high-value pages', 'Maintain natural content flow', 'Regular link audits and updates' ] }; const SEOStrategy: React.FC = () => { const [ref, inView] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, threshold: 0.1, }); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('keywords'); const [selectedKeyword, setSelectedKeyword] = useState(null); return (
{/* Metrics Grid */} {metrics.map((metric, index) => (
{metric.value}
{metric.label}
))} {/* Navigation Tabs */}
{[ { id: 'keywords', label: 'Keywords', icon: Hash }, { id: 'structure', label: 'Structure', icon: Layers }, { id: 'linking', label: 'Linking', icon: Network } ].map((tab) => ( ))}
{/* Content Sections */}
{/* Keyword Strategy */}
{keywordGroups.map((group, index) => (

{group.title}

{group.description}

{group.keywords.map((keyword) => ( setSelectedKeyword( selectedKeyword === keyword.term ? null : keyword.term )} >
{keyword.term}
P{keyword.priority}
Volume: {keyword.volume} Difficulty: {keyword.difficulty}
{selectedKeyword === keyword.term && (
Target Pages:
  • Service Landing Page
  • Case Studies
  • Blog Content
)} ))}

Strategic Importance

{group.importance}

))}
{/* SEO Structure */}
{seoStructure.map((item, index) => (

{item.title}

{item.description}

Implementation

    {item.examples.map((example) => (
  • {example}
    • ))}

Benefits

    {item.benefits.map((benefit) => (
  • {benefit}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Internal Linking */}

{internalLinking.title}

{internalLinking.description}

Key Benefits

    {internalLinking.benefits.map((benefit) => (
  • {benefit}
    • ))}

Best Practices

    {internalLinking.bestPractices.map((practice) => (
  • {practice}
    • ))}

Linking Examples

{internalLinking.examples.map((example) => (
{example.from} {example.to}
{example.impact} Impact

{example.benefit}

))}
); }; export default SEOStrategy;

import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { useInView } from 'react-intersection-observer'; import { Gauge, Smartphone, Wifi, Zap, Server, Shield, MonitorSmartphone, Database, Timer, Cpu, BarChart, ArrowRight, CheckCircle, AlertCircle, Sparkles, ExternalLink, ChevronRight, Globe, LineChart, Rocket, Search, Award, Link, Laptop, TabletSmartphone, Loader2, ArrowUpRight, FileText, Lock, Cloud, Settings } from 'lucide-react'; import { BackgroundParticles } from './BackgroundParticles'; import { SectionHeader } from './ui/SectionHeader'; import { CTAButton } from './ui/CTAButton'; const performanceMetrics = [ { category: 'Core Web Vitals', gradient: 'from-violet-500 to-fuchsia-500', metrics: [ { name: 'LCP', value: '1.2s', target: '2.5s', score: 98, icon: Timer, status: 'excellent', description: 'Largest Contentful Paint measures loading performance', gradient: 'from-emerald-500 to-teal-400' }, { name: 'FID', value: '12ms', target: '100ms', score: 99, icon: Zap, status: 'excellent', description: 'First Input Delay measures interactivity', gradient: 'from-blue-500 to-cyan-400' }, { name: 'CLS', value: '0.05', target: '0.1', score: 97, icon: MonitorSmartphone, status: 'excellent', description: 'Cumulative Layout Shift measures visual stability', gradient: 'from-purple-500 to-pink-400' } ] }, { category: 'Technical Metrics', gradient: 'from-rose-500 to-orange-500', metrics: [ { name: 'Server Response', value: '180ms', target: '200ms', score: 95, icon: Server, status: 'excellent', description: 'Time to First Byte (TTFB) measures server responsiveness', gradient: 'from-amber-500 to-yellow-400' }, { name: 'Cache Hit Ratio', value: '98.5%', target: '95%', score: 96, icon: Database, status: 'excellent', description: 'Percentage of requests served from cache', gradient: 'from-indigo-500 to-violet-400' }, { name: 'Resource Load', value: '0.8s', target: '1s', score: 94, icon: Wifi, status: 'excellent', description: 'Time to load all critical resources', gradient: 'from-rose-500 to-pink-400' } ] } ]; const mobileOptimizations = [ { title: 'Responsive Design', description: 'Fluid layouts that adapt seamlessly to any screen size', icon: Laptop, metrics: { 'Viewport Coverage': '100%', 'Breakpoint Support': 'All Devices', 'Touch Optimization': 'Enhanced' }, gradient: 'from-blue-500 to-cyan-500' }, { title: 'Mobile-First Approach', description: 'Optimized experience prioritizing mobile users', icon: TabletSmartphone, metrics: { 'Mobile Score': '98/100', 'Load Time': '< 2s', 'Interaction Rate': '+45%' }, gradient: 'from-purple-500 to-pink-500' }, { title: 'Progressive Enhancement', description: 'Advanced features that scale with device capabilities', icon: Rocket, metrics: { 'Feature Support': '100%', 'Fallback Coverage': 'Complete', 'Performance Impact': 'Minimal' }, gradient: 'from-amber-500 to-red-500' } ]; const optimizationFeatures = [ { title: 'Performance Optimization', description: 'Maximize speed and efficiency through advanced optimization techniques', icon: Zap, gradient: 'from-blue-500 to-cyan-500', features: [ 'Asset Compression & Minification', 'Lazy Loading Implementation', 'Critical CSS Extraction', 'Resource Prioritization' ], benefits: [ 'Improved User Experience', 'Higher Conversion Rates', 'Better Search Rankings', 'Reduced Bounce Rates' ] }, { title: 'Mobile Experience', description: 'Deliver exceptional mobile-first experiences across all devices', icon: Smartphone, gradient: 'from-purple-500 to-pink-500', features: [ 'Responsive Design Architecture', 'Touch-Optimized Interface', 'Mobile Performance Metrics', 'Progressive Enhancement' ], benefits: [ 'Mobile-First Indexing', 'Enhanced User Engagement', 'Wider Audience Reach', 'Improved Accessibility' ] }, { title: 'Infrastructure', description: 'Build on a robust, scalable, and reliable technical foundation', icon: Cloud, gradient: 'from-emerald-500 to-teal-500', features: [ 'Global CDN Distribution', 'Edge Computing Integration', 'Load Balancing', 'Auto-scaling Architecture' ], benefits: [ 'Global Reach', 'High Availability', 'Scalable Performance', 'Cost Efficiency' ] }, { title: 'Security & Compliance', description: 'Protect your data and maintain regulatory compliance', icon: Shield, gradient: 'from-rose-500 to-orange-500', features: [ 'SSL/TLS Implementation', 'DDoS Protection', 'Regular Security Audits', 'GDPR Compliance' ], benefits: [ 'Data Protection', 'Trust Building', 'Risk Mitigation', 'Regulatory Compliance' ] } ]; const TechnicalPerformance: React.FC = () => { const [ref, inView] = useInView({ triggerOnce: true, threshold: 0.1, }); const [hoveredMetric, setHoveredMetric] = useState(null); const [isAssessing, setIsAssessing] = useState(false); const [websiteUrl, setWebsiteUrl] = useState(''); const handleAssessment = (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsAssessing(true); // Simulate assessment process setTimeout(() => { setIsAssessing(false); // Here you would typically handle the actual assessment alert('Assessment complete! We will send the detailed report to your email.'); }, 2000); }; return (
{/* Performance Metrics */}
{performanceMetrics.map((category, categoryIndex) => (
{category.category}
{category.metrics.map((metric, index) => ( setHoveredMetric(metric.name)} onMouseLeave={() => setHoveredMetric(null)} >
{metric.status}
{metric.value}
{metric.name} Target: {metric.target}
Score: {metric.score}/100
{/* Enhanced Tooltip */} {hoveredMetric === metric.name && (

{metric.description}

 )}
))}
))}
{/* Mobile Optimization Section */}
Mobile Optimization
{mobileOptimizations.map((opt, index) => (

{opt.title}

{opt.description}

{Object.entries(opt.metrics).map(([key, value]) => (
{key} {value}
))}
))}
{/* Website Optimization Features */}
Website Optimization Features
{optimizationFeatures.map((feature, index) => (

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

Features
    {feature.features.map((item) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
Benefits
    {feature.benefits.map((benefit) => (
  • {benefit}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Free Assessment Section */}

Free Website Performance Assessment

Get a comprehensive analysis of your website's performance, mobile optimization, and technical health. Our AI-powered tools will identify opportunities for improvement.

setWebsiteUrl(e.target.value)} className="flex-1 px-6 py-4 rounded-xl bg-white/5 border border-white/10 text-white placeholder-gray-400 focus:outline-none focus:border-purple-500" required /> {isAssessing ? ( <> Analyzing... ) : ( <> Start Free Assessment )}
100% Secure
5-Minute Analysis
Detailed Report
); }; export default TechnicalPerformance;
/// <reference types="vite/client" />

{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2020",
    "useDefineForClassFields": true,
    "lib": ["ES2020", "DOM", "DOM.Iterable"],
    "module": "ESNext",
    "skipLibCheck": true,

    /* Bundler mode */
    "moduleResolution": "bundler",
    "allowImportingTsExtensions": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "moduleDetection": "force",
    "noEmit": true,
    "jsx": "react-jsx",

    /* Linting */
    "strict": true,
    "noUnusedLocals": true,
    "noUnusedParameters": true,
    "noFallthroughCasesInSwitch": true
  },
  "include": ["src"]
}
